Text:
The first movie is called Elďťż Dorado - Temple of the Sun. The second movie is El Dorado -- City of Gold. Like the Lord of the Rings movies, the two El Dorado movies continue with the same characters/villains going after the same goal. You'll be missing out if you don't see both movies.
For some reason, some countries only carry the second movie, which won't make much sense if you haven't seen the first one.

@Kole97: Thanks for the hint!
@LegendET: Thanks for the upload!

Kole97, your information was correct but does NOT correspond to this film! It has nothing to do with  the mentioned "El Dorado Temple of the sun (2010)". Correct 1st part would be http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1789254/
